fr:Rosehill Rail's comprehensive range o: [FR] Rosehill Rail's comprehensive range of level crossing systems, safety solutions, and rail infrastructure products for worldwide projects.
fr:From heavy-duty crossing systems to s: [FR] From heavy-duty crossing systems to safety panels, discover our comprehensive range of sustainable, high-performance products engineered for modern rail networks.
fr:Innovative dimensional stability solu: [FR] Innovative dimensional stability solution for heavy traffic and acute-angle crossings. Features integrated matrix design with simple bolt connections.
fr:Horizontal linking system designed fo: [FR] Horizontal linking system designed for high-speed rail. NEW tongue and groove connections prevent panel separation under dynamic loads.
fr:High-strength modular Road Rail Acces: [FR] High-strength modular Road Rail Access Point system. Sleeper-spacing independent design for temporary or permanent installations.
fr:Fast installation system ideal for av: [FR] Fast installation system ideal for average-sized crossings. Panels can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and tight curves.
fr:Ultimate solution for mining and cons: [FR] Ultimate solution for mining and construction environments. Engineered to handle articulated dumpers and multi-axle haul trucks with steel-like strength.
fr:Conical stud design panels reducing u: [FR] Conical stud design panels reducing unauthorised track access by up to 78%. Available in three variations for different applications.
fr:Sustainable alternative to concrete w: [FR] Sustainable alternative to concrete with 40+ year design life. Slip-resistant surface (PSV 45) with minimal ground preparation required.
fr:Lightweight alternative to concrete w: [FR] Lightweight alternative to concrete with strategic lifting points. Non-spalling design with integrated drainage channels.
fr:Versatile solutions for varying requi: [FR] Versatile solutions for varying requirements. Steel for maximum durability in high-traffic areas, plastic for lightweight corrosion-resistant applications.
fr:Complete range of lifting pins, hooks: [FR] Complete range of lifting pins, hooks, line marking primer, and omni screws to support your installation and maintenance needs.

fr:Learn about Rosehill Rail's three dec: [FR] Learn about Rosehill Rail's three decades of innovation in rail crossing solutions, bespoke manufacturing, and commitment to sustainability.
fr:From pioneering cold cure technology: [FR] From pioneering cold cure technology to becoming a trusted global leader in sustainable rail crossing solutions.
fr:Rosehill Rail, a subsidiary of Rosehi: [FR] Rosehill Rail, a subsidiary of Rosehill Polymers Group, entered the rail industry when approached by American company Reidel Omni to develop a revolutionary polyurethane-based bonding system for rubber railway crossing surfaces.
fr:Our team successfully developed a col: [FR] Our team successfully developed a cold cure bonding process, reducing curing time to just 1.5 hours - a massive improvement over traditional vulcanisation methods that required extended high-temperature heating.
fr:When Omni ceased railway panel produc: [FR] When Omni ceased railway panel production, Rosehill seized the opportunity by purchasing their moulds and beginning our own production of railway crossing panels, marking the true start of Rosehill Rail.
fr:Now a trusted industry leader, we col: [FR] Now a trusted industry leader, we collaborate with rail infrastructure firms worldwide, delivering bespoke crossing solutions that meet specific project requirements across all continents.
fr:Every product is tailored to meet spe: [FR] Every product is tailored to meet specific client needs. Our manufacturing process follows comprehensive operating instructions with meticulous documentation management within robust production and quality frameworks.
fr:ISO 9001:2008 certified with annual N: [FR] ISO 9001:2008 certified with annual NQA audits. Our state-of-the-art computer-controlled manufacturing is overseen by highly trained professionals using purpose-built machinery for railway crossing panels.
fr:Every panel is digitally tracked with: [FR] Every panel is digitally tracked with production data, weight checks, and visual inspections. Each panel is marked with crossing grade, rail type, sleeper type, fastener type, and year of manufacture for easy site verification.
fr:Manufactured using 100% recycled rubb: [FR] Manufactured using 100% recycled rubber tyres with advanced polyurethane binders through our revolutionary cold-cure process. Our panels pose no environmental risk and won't leach chemicals or emit harmful vapours.
fr:All components in our level crossing: [FR] All components in our level crossing systems are designed by Rosehill Rail, including those supplied under other names by our global distributors, ensuring consistent quality and innovation.
fr:Based in Sowerby Bridge, West Yorkshi: [FR] Based in Sowerby Bridge, West Yorkshire, we benefit from strategic access to major transport links, enhancing our ability to deliver products efficiently both locally and globally.

fr:Walkway Panels - Sustainable alternat: [FR] Walkway Panels - Sustainable alternative to concrete paving blocks with 40+ year design life, slip-resistant surface, and full reusability for footpaths and access routes.
fr:Sustainable alternative to concrete p: [FR] Sustainable alternative to concrete paving blocks with slip-resistant surface, full reusability, and weather-independent installation for footpaths and access routes.
fr:The Rosehill Walkway Panel offers a m: [FR] The Rosehill Walkway Panel offers a more secure, sustainable, and cost-effective alternative to traditional concrete paving blocks and aggregate footpaths.
fr:With minimal ground preparation requi: [FR] With minimal ground preparation required and weather-independent fitting capabilities, these panels deliver immediate benefits while providing exceptional long-term performance with reduced environmental impact.
fr:Significantly reduced carbon footprin: [FR] Significantly reduced carbon footprint versus concrete alternatives, with full reusability and relocatable design delivering both immediate and long-term environmental benefits.
fr:Extended service life with reusable a: [FR] Extended service life with reusable and relocatable design
fr:Significantly lower environmental imp: [FR] Significantly lower environmental impact compared to concrete with recycled rubber composition and reusable design.
fr:Weather-independent fitting with mini: [FR] Weather-independent fitting with minimal ground preparation and flexible installation options for rapid deployment.
fr:PSV 45 slip-resistant surface enhance: [FR] PSV 45 slip-resistant surface enhances worker safety and provides reliable access in all weather conditions.
fr:Weed and rodent resistant design with: [FR] Weed and rodent resistant design with minimal ongoing maintenance requirements reduces lifecycle costs.
fr:Complete reusability and relocatable: [FR] Complete reusability and relocatable design allows panels to be moved and reused multiple times across projects.
fr:Extended 40+ year design life and reu: [FR] Extended 40+ year design life and reusability deliver superior value compared to traditional concrete solutions.
fr:Walkway Panels are engineered for lon: [FR] Walkway Panels are engineered for long-term performance with modular construction that allows for flexible installation across various access route applications. The slip-resistant surface meets PSV 45 standards for safe pedestrian access.

fr:Baseplate System - Fast installation: [FR] Baseplate System - Fast installation rubber crossing panels that can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and turnouts for average sized crossings.

fr:The Baseplate system's solid rubber p: [FR] The Baseplate system's solid rubber panels can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails (single and double), and turnouts, making them especially useful for tramway applications and tight curves.
fr:This flexibility allows for very fast: [FR] This flexibility allows for very fast installation and makes the system ideal for average sized crossings across various applications from track access and depots to agricultural and pedestrian use.

de:Baseplate System - Fast installation: [DE] Baseplate System - Fast installation rubber crossing panels that can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and turnouts for average sized crossings.
de:Versatile rubber crossing panels that: [DE] Versatile rubber crossing panels that can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and turnouts for rapid deployment.
de:The Baseplate system's solid rubber p: [DE] The Baseplate system's solid rubber panels can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails (single and double), and turnouts, making them especially useful for tramway applications and tight curves.
de:This flexibility allows for very fast: [DE] This flexibility allows for very fast installation and makes the system ideal for average sized crossings across various applications from track access and depots to agricultural and pedestrian use.
de:Panels can be modified for cut-to-fit: [DE] Panels can be modified for cut-to-fit installations, and individual panels can be removed and replaced without dislodging neighbouring panels.

de:Panels can be manufactured to fit aro: [DE] Panels can be manufactured to fit around tight curves, making them especially useful for tramway applications.
de:Individual panels can be removed and: [DE] Individual panels can be removed and replaced without dislodging neighbouring panels for easy maintenance.
de:Adapted for all types of rail, clips,: [DE] Adapted for all types of rail, clips, sleepers, and gauge types with anti-skid compliance.
de:The Baseplate System provides maximum: [DE] The Baseplate System provides maximum flexibility for crossing installations where standard solutions may not fit. Designed for average sized crossings, this system excels in situations requiring adaptation to existing infrastructure.
de:Each panel is manufactured to 1.8 met: [DE] Each panel is manufactured to 1.8 meters and can be cut in half for shorter crossings, providing unprecedented installation flexibility while maintaining structural integrity and safety compliance.
de:Perfect for tramway applications with: [DE] Perfect for tramway applications with tight curves and complex track configurations requiring cut-to-fit solutions.

fr:TITAN Heavy Duty System - Ultimate he: [FR] TITAN Heavy Duty System - Ultimate heavy-duty rail crossing solution for mining, construction, and industrial environments with articulated dumpers and multi-axle haul trucks.
fr:The world's strongest rail crossing s: [FR] The world's strongest rail crossing system designed for articulated dumpers, multi-axle haul trucks, and the heaviest industrial traffic.
fr:TITAN represents the pinnacle of cros: [FR] TITAN represents the pinnacle of crossing technology, combining Rosehill Rail's exclusive cold cure moulding process with unique polyurethane chemistry to create panels with the surface deflection of rubber but the strength of steel.
fr:Individual panels are manufactured un: [FR] Individual panels are manufactured under compression to ensure dimensional stability and combat Compressive Set, preventing distortion and gapping that can compromise safety and performance in heavy-duty applications.

fr:Manufactured under compression to pre: [FR] Manufactured under compression to prevent distortion and gapping, maintaining dimensional stability under extreme loads.
fr:NEW moulded rubber tongue and groove: [FR] NEW moulded rubber tongue and groove connections secure against vertical lift and panel separation.
fr:Entire crossing held in one matrix pr: [FR] Entire crossing held in one matrix preventing accidental panel dislodging with end restraint security.
fr:Particularly suitable for long crossi: [FR] Particularly suitable for long crossings and angled road intersections requiring maximum structural integrity.
fr:TITAN is engineered for the most extr: [FR] TITAN is engineered for the most extreme conditions, combining innovative manufacturing techniques with premium materials to create the ultimate heavy-duty crossing solution.
fr:The system's unique compression manuf: [FR] The system's unique compression manufacturing process ensures each panel maintains dimensional stability while the tongue and groove connections provide secure interlocking to prevent vertical lift under extreme loading.
fr:Recommended installation includes Ros: [FR] Recommended installation includes Rosehill Rail's exclusive Rubber Edge Beam system with wide outer panels for maximum performance and longevity.
fr:Designed to handle the extreme loads: [FR] Designed to handle the extreme loads of mining equipment including articulated dumpers and heavy haul vehicles.
